data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Soulier-Perkins, Adeline, Stroiński, Adam (2013): When the Lophopids cross the Lydekker line from New Guinea, a new species for the genus Maana (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha). Zootaxa 3640 (4): 589-596, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3640.4.7
